    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(SUT system,
                State state,
                double duration)
         throws ActionFailedException
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Takes a system and its state as input and executes a certain action (e.g. a click). The duration parameter indicates how fast the action should be executed. For example: If the action moves the cursor on a widget before clicking on it, a high value for this parameter will cause the mouse movement to be slowed down. However, the value is only a recommendation.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Action
        state - the SUT's current state
        duration - the duration of the action in seconds
        Throws:
        ActionFailedException - if action failed
